synopsis.text: Rather than donning a prisoner's uniform at Deadman Wonderland, Kiyomasa Senji was once a dedicated police officer, utilizing his unique Branch of Sin abilities to combat crime in a post-apocalyptic Japan. After rescuing a young orphan named Izuru Tsukiyoshi from the clutches of the notorious Goreless Peace gang, Senji finds himself in the crosshairs of their ruthless leader, Keigo. Refusing to align himself with the very evil he has sworn to eradicate, Senji's decision sets off a dangerous chain of events that ultimately shape his future as the infamous Deadman. This riveting tale delves into Senji's past, offering a deeper understanding of the motivations that drive his actions and providing a fresh perspective on the Deadman Wonderland saga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
